EqnSelectorConnImp.h

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /*  
00002  * File: EqnSelectorConnImp.h 
00003  * ------------------- 
00004  * Header file of implementation connection list 
00005  * for EqnSelector class
00006  *
00007  * This class and its inheritance classes implement 
00008  * the connection list for EqnSelector class and its inheritance classes.
00009  *
00010  * All data in this class and its inheritance classes should be copied 
00011  * from EqnSelector class and its inheritance classes except 
00012  * connection data:
00013  *        copy values for value-type data
00014  *    copy address for pointer type data (shared)
00015  * 
00016  * ------------------------------------------  
00017  * Created by HPan in Feb. 2006
00018  *        
00019  * 
00020  */  
00021 
00022 #ifndef EQNSELECTORCONNIMP_H_ 
00023 #define EQNSELECTORCONNIMP_H_ 
00024 #include "../utl/DataPool.h"
00025 #include "../facilities/Facilities.h"
00026 
00027 class EqnSelector;
00028 
00029 class EqnSelectorConnImp { 
00030  public: 
00031         EqnSelectorConnImp(EqnSelector* eqnSec); 
00032         virtual ~EqnSelectorConnImp(); 
00033 
00034         virtual void registerData();    // register data from EqnSelector
00035         virtual void switchFullSetVars()=0;             // switch the full set of variables
00036         virtual void reduceToPrimarySet()=0;    // reduce full set to primary set (FIM)
00037         virtual void reduceImplicitLevel()=0;   // reduce the implicit level of the primary set
00038         virtual void updateExpVars()=0;                 // update the explicit primary variables        
00039   
00040 protected:
00041         // --- Data copied from  EqnSelector class---
00042         int nCells, nConns, nWells;
00043         int nPhases, nComps, nHCPhases, nHCComps, nVars;
00044         bool mBlackOil;                 // black-oil?
00045 
00046 
00047         int nPri, nSec;                                 // number of primary and secondary variables
00048         const int *nImpVars;                    // number of implicit variables for each block
00049         const int *mCellStatus;                 // cell status (any HC phase disappeared?)
00050 
00051         DataPool *mDataPool;                    // pointer to datapool
00052         const Facilities *pFacilities;
00053 
00054         double *mDiag, *mOffD_A, *mOffD_B;              // Reservoir Jacobian (diag and offdiags)
00055         double *mRHS;                                                   // Mass balance equation RHS                                                                                                                    
00056         double *mFlash_JAC, *mFlash_RHS;                // flash Jacobian and RHS
00057 
00058 
00059         double *mTmp;           // temporary work space
00060         int *mIpiv;                     // temporary work space
00061 
00062         EqnSelector* mEqnSel;
00063 
00064 };
00065  
00066 #endif
